verses.roman:
vasanta-kāle rāsa-līlā kare govardhane
antardhāna kailā saṅketa kari' rādhā-sane

synonyms: vasanta-kāle—during the season of spring; rāsa-līlā—the rāsa dance; kare—does; govardhane—near the Govardhana Hill; antardhāna—disappearance; kailā—did; saṅketa—indication; kari'-making; rādhā-sane—with Rādhārāṇī.
translation: During the season of springtime, when the rāsa dance was going on, suddenly Kṛṣṇa disappeared from the scene, indicating that He wanted to be alone with Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī.
